content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: It's true the apartment in Magdeburg is in a prime location and offers excellent facilities, which definitely add value. However, my initial thought for this unit was around 1200 Euros per month. Max, considering our current market situation, I'm willing to lower the price slightly, but only to 1150 Euros. What are your thoughts on this figure?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration, Mr. Schmidt. However, I must carefully manage my expenses as a student. With so many attractive aspects of this apartment, I believe the rental price should reflect the current market trends even more generously in my favor. Could we possibly look into agreeing on a price around 1050 Euros per month? That would be much more suitable for my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my sole intention is maximizing the income from the apartment, and I find it difficult to lower the price further to 1050 Euros, considering the prime location and high-quality features of the apartment. I apologize if it doesn't meet your budget expectations, but I must maintain my stance on this matter. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
